short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copart/IAAI/Manheim sites action recorder and account manager

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
These tools help dealers buy cars from copart.com and Iaai.com using the company account. The tools also assist in recognizing which user is using this account to purchase cars. Additionally, each user has their personal bids and watchlist.

Also this is the plus version is support Manheim.
Security level increased. Multi-Extesnion.
For using this extension need install GLB.GE controller
